scripts.build-apps: npm run vue-personal-page && npm run webjack
scripts.vue-personal-page: cd apps/vue-personal-page && npm install && npm run build && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../..
scripts.webjack: cd apps/webjack && git submodule update --init && cd webjack-ui && npm install && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.d-prepare: npm run prepare-env && npm run build-apps
scripts.d-start: docker run -d --name personal-server -p 80:80 -p 443:443 -v "/c/Users/capel/docker:/mnt/shared" -e DEFAULT_APP=vue-personal-page -e SESSION_SECRET=ssshhhhh -e LOG_FILENAME=development.log -e TRACER_LEVEL=log -e ENABLE_HTTPS=true -e HTTPS_KEY_PATH="/mnt/shared/test-certificate.key" -e HTTPS_CERT_PATH="/mnt/shared/test-certificate.cer" -e HTTPS_PASSPHRASE="test-certificate" l3bowski/personal-server:latest
scripts.d-stop: docker stop personal-server && docker rm personal-server
